sentences.en: As they flow south, the five rivers converge.
Hundreds of coaches will converge on the capital.
sentences.cn: 数百辆长途汽车将会在首都汇集。

sentences.en: Hundreds of tractors will converge on the capital.
sentences.cn: 成百上千的拖拉机将向首都聚集。

sentences.en: In this case the rays obviously do not converge.
Ions of different isotopes converge at different points on the photographic plate.
sentences.cn: 在照相底板上不同的同位素的离子会聚于不同点.

sentences.en: Near Stalingard , the river Don and Volga converge in a very striking way.
sentences.cn: 顿河和伏尔加河在斯大林格勒附近是以一种异常奇特的方式汇合的.

sentences.en: Notice that in all cases, the rays either diverge from or converge toward the foci.
sentences.cn: 注意在所有的情况下, 光线不是从焦点发散就是会聚到焦点.

sentences.en: Our previously opposed views are beginning to converge.
sentences.cn: 我们原来相互对立的观点开始趋于一致.

sentences.en: The cable stays converge to a single point on the apex of the tower.
sentences.cn: 纲索在塔架顶部集中在一点.

sentences.en: The resulting sequence will usually converge.
sentences.cn: 解序列一般说是收敛的.

sentences.en: The results converge reasonably well for the twelve degress of freedom case.
sentences.cn: 对于十二个自由度的情形来说,结果收敛得相当好.

sentences.en: The results converge towards this truth.
sentences.cn: 其结果趋近于这个真理.

sentences.en: The results show the advantage of LM arithmetic and good converge property.
sentences.cn: 实验结果显示了lm算法 的优越性,网络具有良好的收敛特性.

sentences.en: The two rivers converge into one near Pittsburgh.
sentences.cn: 这两条河在匹兹堡附近汇合。

sentences.en: The uniquely - grooved skull allows the snake's eyes to converge forward.
sentences.cn: 凹进去的独特头骨也能让蛇眼聚焦.

sentences.en: They will converge at the coast.

words.tran_cn: [数] 收敛的；会聚性的；趋集于一点的
聚合，集中于一点（converge的ing形式）
会聚；使聚集；使向一点会合

trans.tran_cn: 汇集，聚集，（路、线等）相交，汇合，（思想等）趋同
trans.tran_en: if groups of people converge in a particular place, they come there from many different places and meet together to form a large crowd

trans.tran_cn: 会合； 互相靠拢； 聚集， 集中； 趋近
trans.tran_en: to come from different directions and meet at the same point to become one thing
